Deutsch: Die List der offenen Stadttore. 32. Strategem (Einen Hinterhalt vortäuschen, der die eigene Schwäche verschleiert.)
English: the empty city stratagem (in which Zhuge Liang presents himself as unperturbed while making it evident that his city is undefended, hoping his adversary will suspect an ambush)
francais: Le Piège de la ville vide
